name: part_013
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】『EVERMORE』 Ninomae Ina'nis Birthday Live 2025  #EvermoreLIVE [I-J11Da5ONY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Ending credits roll over various 3D animated scenes featuring Ninomae Ina'nis and other Hololive members.
A handwritten thank-you message from Ninomae Ina'nis to her viewers and staff.

subtitles.original: STORY ANIMATION: Animation: tellingbone / Sound Editing & Mixing: Kickback Sound Design
subtitles.english: STORY ANIMATION: Animation: tellingbone / Sound Editing & Mixing: Kickback Sound Design

subtitles.original: MUSIC: トライフロンティア合同会社 / すくろーす
山本こーすけ / ふじそば / クックルP
Sound City / 小林彩彩 / 中山太陽 / 堀口彩花
subtitles.english: Sound City / Kobayashi Ayasa / Nakayama Taiyo / Horiguchi Sayaka

subtitles.original: I'm really happy that I was able to share this special day with you today!
subtitles.english: I'm really happy that I was able to share this special day with you today!

subtitles.original: Did you enjoy the live? Do you like the new outfit?? hehe
subtitles.english: Did you enjoy the live? Do you like the new outfit?? hehe

subtitles.original: Just like the theme of the outfit, I would like to continue to do my bestest with everything I do!
subtitles.english: Just like the theme of the outfit, I would like to continue to do my bestest with everything I do!

subtitles.original: ... because that is what a hero... yuusha would do! :D
subtitles.english: ... because that is what a hero... yuusha would do! :D

subtitles.original: Thank you for cheering for me! always!! I really wouldn't be here without all your support!!
subtitles.english: Thank you for cheering for me! always!! I really wouldn't be here without all your support!!

subtitles.original: and of course, BIG THANK YOU to all the staff & creators that could make this happen too!!
subtitles.english: and of course, BIG THANK YOU to all the staff & creators that could make this happen too!!

subtitles.original: I am always indebted to everyone's passion!! THANK YOU THANK YOU & THANK YOU!
subtitles.english: I am always indebted to everyone's passion!! THANK YOU THANK YOU & THANK YOU!
